items.sentence: Tom wasn\'t the one who showed Mary around Boston.
She keeps complaining that she doesn\'t have time.
His father passed away last night in the hospital.
Hong Kong International Airport is a busy airport.
How long does the airport bus take to the airport?
I arrived at the bus stop just after the bus left.
I called you because I need to ask you a question.
When was it that Tom visited Mary in the hospital?
Which is the most difficult language in the world?
Why did you turn down his request for a pay raise?
My sister married a high school teacher last June.
Tom likes to stay home and read books on weekends.
Tom lives alone in a small cabin near a waterfall.
Tom put the letter opener back in the desk drawer.
Tom showed Mary a picture of John and another boy.
Tom showed up at the party wearing a suit and tie.
Tom was arrested for carrying 30 grams of cocaine.
Tom was stuck in Boston because of the snow storm.
Tom was the one sitting closest to the microphone.
They were accused of supplying arms to terrorists.
